name: Dragon Simulator
description:
Control this small 3D Dragon as he terrorizes castles and smashes his way all over the show. If you always wanted to run and see what it might feel like to be a Dragon, this game is for you. Loaded with fun 3D effects.


Features:
--Control a Dragon
--4 Huge Medieval Themed Maps
--Real Fire Breathing Action
--Munch on People, Horses. Find some Mushrooms
--Day and Night Versions of the map
--24 Missions to Complete
--Go for the High Score
--High Quality Graphics in a Medieval setting
--Be sure and check everywhere to uncover all the secrets


Game play: There are 24 missions to be completed. you can choose to either complete the missions or you can choose Free Play and have fun smashing around.


If you like playing Bear Simulator, Shark Simulator, Goat Simulator, Wolf or Dinosaur Sim, you will probably enjoy this Dragon game. If you don't enjoy those types of 3D free play games, you should look elsewhere because you will not enjoy this game. Don't even bother downloading this game if you are not ready to have some imagination. We did our best to simulate a fun dragon experience, but the game is not perfect, far from it. Have fun and enjoy playing.
